segments.text: I can't wait until my car is repaired . The commuting with public transportation is killing me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it is ! Take this morning for example . The subway was so packed this morning , I got totally squished by about a hundred busy commuters on the way to work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At least the subway is better than the bus . It's faster for one thing . And usually less crowded . But the drawback is that the subway is more expensive than the bus . It adds up over time , if you take it every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true . The bus is even worse . Just thinking about taking the bus every day makes me tired ! Hey , how do you get to work every day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ride my bike . I don't live too far away , so it's pretty convenient . it's only about a ten minute bike ride from my house to the office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll bet it's good exercise , too ... a good way to keep fit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , not only a good way to keep in shape , but a good way to relieve stress as well . While you're stressed out by your commute , I'm releasing all the stress of the day with mine .
segments.speaker: S2
